com.ibm.lpex.jcl
Class JclParser

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.ibm.lpex.core.LpexCommonParser
        |
        +--com.ibm.lpex.jcl.JclParser
Direct Known Subclasses:
JclParserJES2ESA
public class JclParser
extends LpexCommonParser

Java LPEX parser for MVS JCL.

The system-specific options used by JclParser are JES3 and ESA.

Actions added by this parser: jobs, execs, dds, procs, errors for selective views of the cards and errors in the document.

See Also:
getJclOptions()

getJclOptions

public int getJclOptions()
Query parser's system-specific JCL options. The parser uses two sets of options: JES2 / JES3, and ESA / XA.
JES2 or JES3 specifies the Job entry subsystem. The default is JES3.
ESA specifies that MVS/ESA JCL (JES level 4) is used; XA specifies that only MVS/XA JCL (JES level 2) is recognized. The default is ESA.

To modify these settings, extend JclParser and override this method.

See Also:
OPTION_JES2, OPTION_JES3, OPTION_ESA, OPTION_XA
